entry.title: Friday night: Light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 7:27 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 7:27 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 40 percent chance of light snow late in the evening and overnight. Fog patches in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 7:27 PM CST Friday 06 January 2023
